item.title: Peter Schiff Says Investors Have Accepted Gold's Rally Is 'Here To Stay' As Silver Prices Soar To A Fresh High
item.description: Spot silver prices climbed to a new high of $75.15 per troy ounce, surging by 4.6% before paring some of the gains.

item.title: Nvidia’s $20 Billion Groq Deal Is 'Expensive But Strategic,' Says BofA
item.description: Bank of America reiterated a ‘Buy’ rating on Nvidia and maintained a price target of $275 on the company’s shares, as per TheFly.

item.title: This Anonymous 4chan Crypto Prediction Got Tom Lee’s Attention – But Traders Are Not Sold On The Call
item.description: 4chan user claims infrastructure-led adoption will drive the next phase for Bitcoin, Ethereum, and Solana.

item.title: Jack In The Box Is Shrinking To Survive: Store Closures, A Del Taco Exit And A High-Stakes Reset
item.description: Jack in the Box may take a bigger hit than rivals McDonald’s and Shake Shack, as the fast-food industry struggles with changing consumer preferences a...

item.title: Does Nvidia’s Groq Licensing Mega-Deal Expose A Quiet Weak Spot In Its AI Chip Empire?
item.description: As inference heats up and rivals close in, Jensen Huang makes a surprise move that could reshape Nvidia’s long-term dominance.
